title: ISFSymbol.GetArrowHeadInfo
description: Gets an array of doubles that describe the geometry of the arrowhead on the far end of the leader line.
returns: Array of doubles describing format (see Remarks )
remarks:
Format of return information is the following array of doubles:
retval
[0]
= Arrow length (leader into arrowhead)
retval
[1]
= Arrowhead length
retval
[2]
= Arrowhead width
retval
[3]
= Arrowhead style as defined in
swArrowStyle_e
